name: Battlefield 3: Close Quarters
description:
Battlefield 3: Close Quarters is an action-shooter game developed by Electronic Arts DICE. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Electronic Arts. On review aggregator Metacritic, Battlefield 3: Close Quarters has a score of 73. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Battlefield 3: Close Quarters is available on PlayStation 3 and PC.
Johan Skugge and Jukka Rintamäki scored the game.
